languages.text: {n}Эльдарка одаривает вас странным взглядом.{/n} "Твои слова тревожат меня своей искренностью, элантах. Твой разум... чище и возвышенней, чем я себе представляла. Стать частью кого-то..." {n}На секунду Ирлиэт погружается в свои мысли.{/n}

{n}Yrliet gives you a strange look.{/n} "Your words trouble me with their sincerity, elantach. Your mind is... much cleaner and loftier than I imagined. To become a part of someone..." {n}For a second, Yrliet lapses into thought.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Эльдарка одаривает вас странным взглядом.{/n} "Твои слова тревожат меня своей искренностью, элантах. Твой разум... чище и возвышенней, чем я себе представляла. Стать частью кого-то..." {n}На секунду Ирлиэт погружается в свои мысли.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari gives you a strange look.{/n} "Your words trouble me with their sincerity, elantach. Your mind is... much more clean and lofty than I had imagined. To become a part of somebody..." {n}For a second, Yrliet drifts off into her own thoughts.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari gives you a strange look.{/n} "Your words trouble me with their sincerity, elantach. Your mind is... much more clean and lofty than I had imagined. To become a part of somebody..." {n}For a second, Yrliet drifts off into her own thoughts.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a strange look.{/n} "Your words trouble me with their sincerity, elantach. Your mind is... much cleaner and loftier than I imagined. To become a part of someone..." {n}For a second, Yrliet lapses into thought.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a strange look.{/n} "Your words trouble me with their sincerity, elantach. Your mind is... much cleaner and loftier than I imagined. To become a part of someone..." {n}For a second, Yrliet lapses into thought.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特以古怪的目光看了你一眼。{/n}“你的真诚让我感到有些困扰，外界人。你的心灵……远比我想象的更清澈、更高尚。成为某人不可分割的一部分……”{n}伊莉耶特在转瞬间陷入了沉思。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a strange look.{/n} "Your words trouble me with their sincerity, elantach. Your mind is... much cleaner and loftier than I imagined. To become a part of someone..." {n}For a second, Yrliet lapses into thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特以古怪的目光看了你一眼。{/n}“你的真诚让我感到有些困扰，外界人。你的心灵……远比我想象的更清澈、更高尚。成为某人不可分割的一部分……”{n}伊莉耶特在转瞬间陷入了沉思。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet te dirige una mirada extraña.{/n} «La sinceridad de tus palabras me turba, elantach. Tu mente es... mucho más limpia y noble de lo que imaginaba. Convertirme en parte de alguien tan...». {n}Durante un segundo, Yrliet se sume en sus pensamientos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a strange look.{/n} "Your words trouble me with their sincerity, elantach. Your mind is... much cleaner and loftier than I imagined. To become a part of someone..." {n}For a second, Yrliet lapses into thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet te dirige una mirada extraña.{/n} «La sinceridad de tus palabras me turba, elantach. Tu mente es... mucho más limpia y noble de lo que imaginaba. Convertirme en parte de alguien tan...». {n}Durante un segundo, Yrliet se sume en sus pensamientos.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet vous adresse un regard étrange.{/n} « La sincérité de vos paroles me trouble, elantach. Votre esprit est bien plus... propre et noble que je le pensais. Devenir un fragment de quelqu'un... » {n}Yrliet se plonge dans ses pensées quelques instants.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a strange look.{/n} "Your words trouble me with their sincerity, elantach. Your mind is... much cleaner and loftier than I imagined. To become a part of someone..." {n}For a second, Yrliet lapses into thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet vous adresse un regard étrange.{/n} « La sincérité de vos paroles me trouble, elantach. Votre esprit est bien plus... propre et noble que je le pensais. Devenir un fragment de quelqu'un... » {n}Yrliet se plonge dans ses pensées quelques instants.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet wirft dir einen merkwürdigen Blick zu.{/n} "Eure Worte beunruhigen mich wegen ihrer Aufrichtigkeit, Elantach. Euer Geist ist ... viel klarer und erhabener, als ich gedacht hatte. Teil von jemandem zu werden ..." {n}Für eine Sekunde verfällt Yrliet in Nachdenken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a strange look.{/n} "Your words trouble me with their sincerity, elantach. Your mind is... much cleaner and loftier than I imagined. To become a part of someone..." {n}For a second, Yrliet lapses into thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet wirft dir einen merkwürdigen Blick zu.{/n} "Eure Worte beunruhigen mich wegen ihrer Aufrichtigkeit, Elantach. Euer Geist ist ... viel klarer und erhabener, als ich gedacht hatte. Teil von jemandem zu werden ..." {n}Für eine Sekunde verfällt Yrliet in Nachdenken.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは不思議そうな顔であなたを見る。{/n}「エランタ、お前の言葉には、その誠実さ故に悩まされる。お前の心は…我が想像していたよりもずっと清らかで高尚なようだ。誰かの一部になることは…」{n}一瞬、ユリエットは考えにふける。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a strange look.{/n} "Your words trouble me with their sincerity, elantach. Your mind is... much cleaner and loftier than I imagined. To become a part of someone..." {n}For a second, Yrliet lapses into thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは不思議そうな顔であなたを見る。{/n}「エランタ、お前の言葉には、その誠実さ故に悩まされる。お前の心は…我が想像していたよりもずっと清らかで高尚なようだ。誰かの一部になることは…」{n}一瞬、ユリエットは考えにふける。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet sana tuhaf bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Sözlerinin içtenliği beni düşündürüyor elantach. Zihnin, tahmin ettiğimden çok daha temiz ve heybetli. Birinin parçası hâline gelmek..." {n}Yrliet, bir anlığına düşüncelere dalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a strange look.{/n} "Your words trouble me with their sincerity, elantach. Your mind is... much cleaner and loftier than I imagined. To become a part of someone..." {n}For a second, Yrliet lapses into thought.{/n}

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
